titleStmt.title: Healths improvement: or, Rules comprizing and discovering the nature, method, and manner of preparing all sorts of food used in this nation. Written by that ever famous Thomas Muffett, Doctor in Physick: corrected and enlarged by Christopher Bennet, Doctor in Physick, and fellow of the Colledg of Physitians in London.
titleStmt.author: Moffett, Thomas, 1553-1604.
Bennet, Christopher, 1617-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Newcomb for Samuel Thomson, at the sign of the white Horse in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the white Horse in Pauls Churchyard
